00029 class IndexInfo {

00032     private $name;
00033

00041     private $vendorSpecificInfo = array();

00044     {
00045         $this->name = $name;
00046         $this->isUnique = $isUnique;
00047         $this->vendorSpecificInfo = $vendorInfo;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public function isUnique()
00051     {
00052         return $this->isUnique;
00053     }
00054
